mapper.insert:
select REPLACE(UUID(),'-','')
insert into d_account (id,account, email, `status`, create_time, `password`) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update d_account set account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, account, email, `status`, create_time, `password` from d_account
